colour.models.dataset.cinema_gamut Module¶

Cinema Gamut Colourspace¶

Defines the Canon Cinema Gamut colourspace:

  • CINEMA_GAMUT_COLOURSPACE.

See also

RGB Colourspaces IPython Notebook

References

[1]Canon. (2014). EOS C500 Firmware Update. Retrieved January 14, 2015, from http://www.usa.canon.com/cusa/professional/standard_display/cinema-firmware-c500
colour.models.dataset.cinema_gamut.CINEMA_GAMUT_PRIMARIES = array([[ 0.74, 0.27], [ 0.17, 1.14], [ 0.08, -0.1 ]])¶

Cinema Gamut colourspace primaries.

CINEMA_GAMUT_PRIMARIES : ndarray, (3, 2)

colour.models.dataset.cinema_gamut.CINEMA_GAMUT_ILLUMINANT = u'D65'¶

Cinema Gamut colourspace whitepoint name as illuminant.

CINEMA_GAMUT_ILLUMINANT : unicode

colour.models.dataset.cinema_gamut.CINEMA_GAMUT_WHITEPOINT = (0.31271, 0.32902)¶

Cinema Gamut colourspace whitepoint.

CINEMA_GAMUT_WHITEPOINT : tuple

colour.models.dataset.cinema_gamut.CINEMA_GAMUT_TO_XYZ_MATRIX = array([[ 0.71603649, 0.12968185, 0.10471021], [ 0.26125656, 0.86963121, -0.13088776], [-0.00967617, -0.23647866, 1.3350552 ]])¶

Cinema Gamut colourspace to CIE XYZ tristimulus values matrix.

CINEMA_GAMUT_TO_XYZ_MATRIX : array_like, (3, 3)

colour.models.dataset.cinema_gamut.XYZ_TO_CINEMA_GAMUT_MATRIX = array([[ 1.48984566, -0.2609007 , -0.14242914], [-0.45817234, 1.26164365, 0.15962564], [-0.07035813, 0.22158431, 0.77627493]])¶

CIE XYZ tristimulus values to Cinema Gamut colourspace matrix.

XYZ_TO_CINEMA_GAMUT_MATRIX : array_like, (3, 3)
